column4: and then there's the hordes of people who do database stuff in excell because "Access is too complicated"...
and of course, you don't ask your IT department.. because they'll say "no" anyway
("DVI stands for device independant... you can't view it? must be a problem with your device then..")
h... where do I report this bug:
a CSV file that start with an UTF-16 BOM (little-endian) shows as a Text file (with the BOM showing as ISO-8859-1 text..), but when I click it, the icon changes to that of an MP3 file
I know, I got ops in it ;)
